testcase.classname: To test the location feature of swiggy application
testcase.name: Check if user is able to enter location and navigate
testcase.system-out: Given user is in swiggy homepage...........................................passed When The user enters the location as "bangalore" in search bar..............passed Then Selects the first option...............................................passed Then User is in restaurant list page........................................passed

testcase.classname: To test the location feature of swiggy application
testcase.name: Check if user is able to enter to desired Restaurant page
testcase.system-out: Given user is in swiggy homepage...........................................passed When The user starts to enter the "bangalore" location and navigates to restaurant list page.passed Then Selects and clicks on the first restaurant from the restaurant list...passed Then User is in restaurant homepage.........................................passed
